void AddDisturbanceRequestPacket::addDisturbance (  uint32  nodeID,
int32  lat,
int32  lon,
uint32  angle,
uint32  routeIndex
) 
 

Adds a disturbance to the packet.

Parameters:
nodeID The nodeID where the disturbance is starting.
lat The latitude where the disturbance is located.
lon The longitude where the disturbance is located.
angle The angle, which determins in what direction the disturbance is valid.
extraCost The extra costC factor for the Routemodule.
routeIndex The index in the route for the disturbance.

Parameters:

lastEditUser The user last edited the disturbance the last time, initially the creator.

DisturbanceElement* AddDisturbanceRequestPacket::getDisturbance (   )  const
 

Returns the DisturbanceElements that the packet is containing.

Parameters:
add Set to true if the disturbances is going to be added, false if they are going to be updated.
Returns:
A vector with the DisturbanceElements.
